document.full_text: soap opera "general hospital" scored the highest number of daytime emmy nominations on wednesday, including a nod for best daytime drama alongside canceled daytime soap "all my children."
document.title: "general hospital" leads daytime emmy nominations
lines_and_colors: soap opera "general hospital" scored the highest number of daytime emmy nominations on wednesday, including a nod for best daytime drama alongside canceled daytime soap "all my children."
